subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Stephen Curry scored 26 points, Gordon Hayward’s halfcourt shot at the buzzer fell short, and Golden State held on to add to its N.B.A.-record start to the season.
snippet: Stephen Curry scored 26 points, Gordon Hayward’s halfcourt shot at the buzzer fell short, and Golden State held on to add to its N.B.A.-record start to the season.
